name: Sound Of Death BETA
description:
is a zombie killing game, it is in beta and it has only two maps.

32-bit version is NOT going to be updated as frequently as the 64-bit version, BUT the major updates will be updated in the 32-bit at the same time as in 64-bit.

If you want to use your time little bit more, please write a review. If you have a good idea for the game, then put it into the comments. I might try that idea and if I like the idea of yours, then you're going to see it in the next update.
